name: Split Apart
description:
Casual/Arcade/Puzzle/Action

You played a MM (Man-Made) Cell to dodge the Virus. If you get hit by the Virus, you SPLIT APART!!! How long can U survive? 

When downloading the game, PLEASE READ CAREFULLY! If you want to donate for support (THE DREAM)  you can but it's not necessary! 

If you just what to play it! Available online to play at

tp://www.newgrounds.com/port...

-The game is downloadable as a zip file! Unzip file to PLAY!!
